mission_data.mission_description: Investigate a remote sector of space with no station support in a TSN Light Cruiser. Ships have gone missing here and you were sent to investigate. Keep an eye out and find out whats happening to those ships.

big_message.title: Here There Be Monsters
big_message.subtitle2: A Cannonical Battle For Artemis Armada III

event.name: Mission Briefing Video
event.incoming_comms_text: This is the "Skulls Refuge Nebula" and looks like you've drawn the short straw for tonights patrol. You are on the outskirts of Terran space, and the twin black holes cause havoc with our long range sensors so we don't know much about this sector. Several ships traversing this sector have gone missing the last few months. Be on alert and find out whats happen to our ships.

warning_popup_message.message: Sensor Array: Ensign Rachel reporting in all systems are go
Weapons Control: Ensign Barak reporting in all systems are go
Communications Array: Ensign Sadie reporting in all systems are go
Warp Core: Ensign Jonas reporting in all systems are go
Shield Generators: Ensign Caboose reporting in all systems are go?

event.name: Distress Call 1 Video
event.incoming_comms_text: This is the Arvonian luxury liner "Whale Watcher 1". We are under attack from an Unknown vessel... Engines...Boarding... Please Help!.....

event.name: Luxury Liner Investigation

set_ship_text.name: Whale Watcher 1
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Ship is Severily Damaged. Engines are offline. Shuttles have been launched. No life signs aboard
set_ship_text.hailtext: :Automated Distress Call: Engines are Disabled, Crew is incapacitated. We require immediated assistance

warning_popup_message.message: Ensign Rachel Reporting: Damaged Shuttle located. One life sign onboard. Vitals are weak.

event.incoming_comms_text: We scanned the ship and were able to salvage a captains log recording from the wreckage

event.name: Whale Watcher 1 Recording
event.incoming_comms_text: Such a wonderous sight these space whales are so majestic. You there I don't believe we met.

set_comms_button.text: Contact TSN Command about Whale Watcher 1

event.name: Mission Update Whale Watcher 1

if_comms_button.text: Contact TSN Command about Whale Watcher 1

clear_comms_button.text: Contact TSN Command about Whale Watcher 1

event.incoming_comms_text: Such a shame Tourism is very risky in this sector of space. Check for Survivors.

event.name: Medical Bay 1
event.incoming_comms_text: We have retrieved 1 Arvonian surviver from the Escape Pod. They are undergoing medical treatment now.

event.name: Mission Update Survivor
event.incoming_comms_text: Good Work. At least we saved one poor soul. Keep a look out try and find out what happen.

event.name: Distress Call 2 Video
event.incoming_comms_text: This is the Terran Bulk Cargo "Dauntless". We are under attack from an Unknown vessel... Engines...Boarding... Please Help!.....

event.name: Dauntless Investigation

set_ship_text.name: Dauntless
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Ship is Severily Damaged. Engines are offline. Shuttles have been launched. No life signs aboard
set_ship_text.hailtext: :Automated Distress Call: Engines are Disabled, Crew is incapacitated. We require immediated assistance

event.incoming_comms_text: We scanned the ship and were able to salvage a recording from the wreckage

warning_popup_message.message: Ensign Rachel Reporting: That Strange Object could give us clues to what happen to the Dauntless

event.name: Dauntless Recording
event.incoming_comms_text: What is it? Not sure sir it looks like a beacon of some sort. Take us in for a closer look, there might be some salvage worth gathering?. Engineering, why did we lose power to engines? Captain, unknown vessel appeared behind us. Get us out of here! Can?t sir, something is draining our engines.

warning_popup_message.message: Ensign Rachel Reporting: Upon further study this Beacon is some sort of Warp field disruptor. We call it a Web Generator. You cannot travel at warp near it but impulse power should be unaffected

set_comms_button.text: Contact TSN Command about the Web Generator

event.name: Mission Update Web Generator

if_comms_button.text: Contact TSN Command about the Web Generator

clear_comms_button.text: Contact TSN Command about the Web Generator

event.incoming_comms_text: Intriguing. It seems like the local wildlife must not be the root cause of all these ships disappearing. And someone is in posession of some unique technology. Continue searching the sector we need more information.

event.name: Distress Call 3 Video
event.incoming_comms_text: This is the Terran Science Vessel "Odessa". We are under attack from an Unknown vessel... Engines...Boarding... Please Help!.....

event.name: Odessa Investigation

set_ship_text.name: Odessa
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Ship is Severily Damaged. Engines are offline. Shuttles have been launched. No life signs aboard
set_ship_text.hailtext: :Automated Distress Call: Engines are Disabled, Crew is incapacitated. We require immediated assistance

event.incoming_comms_text: We scanned the ship and were able to salvage a recording from the wreckage

event.name: Odessa Recording
event.incoming_comms_text: Science officer?s log 76.2. This sector of space has an unusually high concentration of stellar creatures. It is an ideal place to study their behaviors in more details. The Piranhas in this sector have been exhibiting aggressive behavior. More so than has ever been reported. I think this might be a breeding ground. There is not much known about the breeding habits of these piranhas.
This is an excellent opportunity for research but I still need to convince the captain to let us take a closer look. The last run in left our long range communication array slightly chewed.

event.name: Mission Update Odessa
event.incoming_comms_text: Piranhas are a fearsome creature. But it doesn't look like Piranhas doomed the Odessa. Find out whats happening to these ships.

warning_popup_message.message: Ensign Rachel Reporting: It's a Web Generator!! You cannot travel at warp near it but impulse power should be unaffected

event.name: Taunt Web
event.incoming_comms_text: Look who has stumbled into my little trap I'll be there soon to help you out

event.name: Radio Signal Audio
event.incoming_comms_text: Is there anyone out there? Help us they have us trapped here waiting for ransom. And if no one pays we will be forced to work in the mines.

set_comms_button.text: Contact TSN Command about the Radio Signal

event.name: Mission Update Radio Signal

if_comms_button.text: Contact TSN Command about the Radio Signal

clear_comms_button.text: Contact TSN Command about the Radio Signal

event.incoming_comms_text: A hostage situation! It is imperative that you rescue those hostages. Find where the hostages are located and launch marines to retrieve them.

event.name: Mission Update Radio Signal 2nd

if_comms_button.text: Contact TSN Command about the Radio Signal

clear_comms_button.text: Contact TSN Command about the Radio Signal

event.incoming_comms_text: A hostage situation! It is imperative that you rescue those hostages. Find where the hostages are located and launch marines to retrieve them.

event.name: Message from Sgt. Stone
event.incoming_comms_text: Let us know when you want us to launch in our shuttle "Marine One." We'll go save those hostages. Just get us closer to the station

warning_popup_message.message: Ensign Rachel Reporting: It's a Web Generator!! You cannot travel at warp within 2000 of it but impulse power should be unaffected

set_comms_button.text: Contact TSN Command about Death's End Station

event.name: Mission Update Death's End Station

if_comms_button.text: Contact TSN Command about Death's End Station

clear_comms_button.text: Contact TSN Command about Death's End Station

event.incoming_comms_text: A pirate outpost! This outpost must be taken care of but you are in just a patrol ship. Find out more information before attempting to destroy it.

event.name: Medical Bay 2
event.incoming_comms_text: There was an incident in the Medbay and the Arvonian Survivor is missing!
There was a commotion by the Sensor Array console!

event.name: Investigate Sensor Array
event.incoming_comms_text: There was a commotion by the Sensor Array console! We are on our way to investigate!

warning_popup_message.message: Report from the Sensor Array: Someone has overloaded the forward Sensor Array. It's damaged now!
Report from Weapons Control: Unauthorized work in progress on the forward beam emmiters.
Report from Weapons Control: The Forward Beam power regulators just blew. Someone bypassed the safeties
Report from Communications Array: Unauthorized Access to long range communications in progress
Report from the Warp Core: Unauthorize maintainance to the warp and impulse regulators in progress

event.name: Saboteur Comms
event.incoming_comms_text: Location Broadcast...To vessels in the area this is Artemis location.

warning_popup_message.message: Report from the Warp Core: Unauthorize maintainance in progress to the warp and impulse regulators
Report from the Warp Core: The Impulse Regulator was crossed with the warp power converter causing an overload.
Report from the Shield Generators: Unscheduled Maintainance to rear shield deflector control in progress
Report from the Shield Generators: Oh Dear the rear shield emitters just shorted out.
Report from the Sensor Array: Unauthorized access to long range sensors power modulator in progress.

event.name: This Was Sabotage
event.incoming_comms_text: Captain, This was not defective wiring. This was Sabotage! The Arvonian Survivor must have been a Pirate plant. Keep an eye out for unusual activity. Dispatch Security to locations you think he might be.

event.name: Weapons Fire Video
event.incoming_comms_text: Weapons Fire! We are in pursuit

event.name: Nothing
event.incoming_comms_text: we found Nothing Unusual Here

event.name: Brig Video
event.incoming_comms_text: Captain we have apprehended the Saboteur.

event.name: Location Weapons Control
event.incoming_comms_text: We're on our way! We'll report back in a minute what we find!

event.name: Location Communications Array
event.incoming_comms_text: We're on our way! We'll report back in a minute what we find!

event.name: Location Warp Core
event.incoming_comms_text: We're on our way! We'll report back in a minute what we find!

event.name: Location Shield Generator
event.incoming_comms_text: We're on our way! We'll report back in a minute what we find!

event.name: Location Sensor Array
event.incoming_comms_text: We're on our way! We'll report back in a minute what we find!

event.name: Blow Console
event.incoming_comms_text: I guess thats one way to turn off the Broadcast Signal. The signal has been disabled. Now we just need to repair the damage you've caused.

event.name: Code Pad
event.incoming_comms_text: I've narrowed to passord down to 5 phrases, but you are going to have to guess which phrase.

warning_popup_message.message: Enter Password phrase to Disable Location Broadcast
A Pirate's...
Drink up...
No Prey...
Why's the...
Davy Jone's...
...Me Hearties
...Rum Gone
...Life For Me!
...No Pay

event.name: Password Cracked

warning_popup_message.message: Password Accepted powering down beacon

event.incoming_comms_text: Password accepted the beacon is powering down

event.name: Password Invalid

warning_popup_message.message: Invalid Password

event.incoming_comms_text: That wasn't right try again.

event.name: Password Invalid

warning_popup_message.message: Invalid Password

event.incoming_comms_text: That wasn't right try again.

event.name: Password Invalid

warning_popup_message.message: Invalid Password

event.incoming_comms_text: That wasn't right try again.

event.name: Ignore Mysterious Message
event.incoming_comms_text: What Brings a TSN Patrol ship to our humble home? Have you come to study the various Creatures? Or maybe transporting some carge? Or is it that you are Just here to take in the sights? Unfortunately your trip comes to an end here. Here's hoping you can make ransom or else you'll spend the rest of your days mining ore for us.

event.name: Wolf Spider Introduction
event.incoming_comms_text: What Brings a TSN Patrol ship to our humble home? Have you come to study the various Creatures? Or maybe transporting some carge? Or is it that you are Just here to take in the sights? Unfortunately your trip comes to an end here. Here's hoping you can make ransom or else you'll spend the rest of your days mining ore for us.

set_comms_button.text: Contact TSN Command about Wolf Spider

event.name: Mission Update Wolf Spider

if_comms_button.text: Contact TSN Command about Wolf Spider

clear_comms_button.text: Contact TSN Command about Wolf Spider

event.incoming_comms_text: A pirate ship! This explains what has been happening to those ships. Destroy Wolf Spider if you can. Pirating will not be tolerated.

event.name: Escape
event.incoming_comms_text: Unauthorized Shuttle launched!
Our docking Tractor beam has been damaged. We cannot bring in the escape pod. Give us 3 minutes to repair it then we can capture the escape pod.

event.name: Rescued Pirate
event.incoming_comms_text: Now that I've collected my fellow comrade here is a "Parting Gift". We'll be back to pick up the pieces. Assuming anything is left.

event.name: Captured Comrade
event.incoming_comms_text: My comrade understood the risks their job entailed. Enjoy this "Parting Gift". We'll be back to pick up the pieces. Assuming anything is left.

event.name: Fallen Comrade
event.incoming_comms_text: My comrade understood the risks their job entailed. Enjoy this "Parting Gift". We'll be back to pick up the pieces. Assuming anything is left.

event.name: Taunt Still Alive Video
event.incoming_comms_text: I see you are more resilient than a Shark's backside. It has been a while since I have had a good challenge.

event.name: Attrition Video
event.incoming_comms_text: I grow tired of these games, your ransom is not worth the trouble. Leave or I will destroy you

event.name: Launch Marine Shuttle
event.incoming_comms_text: Marine One away. Wish us luck!

event.name: Launch Marine Shuttle to Far
event.incoming_comms_text: Are you Crazy? We are too far away! We'll never make it.

event.name: Launch Marine Shuttle Not Exist
event.incoming_comms_text: We don't have the station on our sensors.

event.name: Cannot Land at Station
event.incoming_comms_text: Station has been destroyed we are on our way back!

event.name: Redocked with Artemis
event.incoming_comms_text: We have returned. To bad we couldn't save those Hostages.

event.name: Landed at Station Video
event.incoming_comms_text: We've Landed Captain and secured the shuttle. We'll find those hostages just hold those ships off for as long as possible.

event.name: Secured the Hostages Video
event.incoming_comms_text: Captain we have the hostages and our heading back to our shuttle now.
We have freed 10 Hostages

event.name: Secured the Docking Bay Video
event.incoming_comms_text: Captain the shuttle's been Damaged!! We have secured the Docking Port though. Dock with the Station and pick us up!

event.name: Hostages Dying
event.incoming_comms_text: Hostage down! We only have |Hostage_Alive| left!

event.name: Waiting Video
event.incoming_comms_text: Artemis Where are you? We Need Pick up! Now!
Hostages down! We only have |Hostage_Alive| left!

event.name: Too Late Video
event.incoming_comms_text: Artemis Where are you? We are out of Time!!

set_comms_button.text: Contact TSN Command Failure about to Rescue Hostages

event.name: Mission Update Too Late

if_comms_button.text: Contact TSN Command Failure about to Rescue Hostages

clear_comms_button.text: Contact TSN Command Failure about to Rescue Hostages

event.incoming_comms_text: It's Unfortunate we could not save the hostages. Avenge them by destroying Death's End Station and Wolf Spider.

event.name: Dock with Station Video
event.incoming_comms_text: Captain Everyone's on Board and we have secured the Airlock. Lets get out of here!

event.name: Contact TSN Command Video
event.incoming_comms_text: We will send reinforcements, meet us at these coordinates. It is imperative you get these hostages to safety.

event.name: Wolf Spider HAIL! Video
event.incoming_comms_text: You may have won this time, Terran Scum, but we will meet again.

event.name: Station Destroyed
event.incoming_comms_text: Confirmed Death's End Station is Destroyed

set_comms_button.text: Contact TSN Command, Death's End Station Destroyed!

event.name: Death's End Station Destroyed

if_comms_button.text: Contact TSN Command, Death's End Station Destroyed!

clear_comms_button.text: Contact TSN Command, Death's End Station Destroyed!

event.incoming_comms_text: It's Unfortunate we could not save the hostages. But you have Avenged them by destroying Death's End Station. Find and Destroy Wolf Spider!

event.name: Death's End Station Destroyed

if_comms_button.text: Contact TSN Command, Death's End Station Destroyed!

clear_comms_button.text: Contact TSN Command, Death's End Station Destroyed!

event.incoming_comms_text: It's Unfortunate we could not save the hostages. But you have Avenged them by destroying Death's End Station and Wolf Spider!

event.name: Station Destroyed
event.incoming_comms_text: Confirmed Death's End Station is Destroyed

set_comms_button.text: Contact TSN Command, Death's End Station Destroyed.

event.name: Death's End Station Destroyed

if_comms_button.text: Contact TSN Command, Death's End Station Destroyed.

clear_comms_button.text: Contact TSN Command, Death's End Station Destroyed.

event.incoming_comms_text: Excellent you have destroyed Death's End Station. But you must get the Hostages to safety! Watch out Wolf Spider is still out there!

event.name: Death's End Station Destroyed

if_comms_button.text: Contact TSN Command, Death's End Station Destroyed.

clear_comms_button.text: Contact TSN Command, Death's End Station Destroyed.

event.incoming_comms_text: Excellent, you have destroyed Death's End Station and Wolf Spider has been destroyed. The sector is safe. Its time to bring those hostages home.

event.name: Wolf Spider Destroyed
event.incoming_comms_text: Confirmed Wolf Spider is Destroyed

event.name: Weak Signal Video
event.incoming_comms_text: Did you think it would be that easy?

big_message.title: Cast
big_message.subtitle1: Admiral: Souvik Ghosh Arvonian Captain: Max Clark
big_message.subtitle2: Dauntless Captain: Grant Hoskins Dauntless Officer: Lauren Chaiken

big_message.title: Cast
big_message.subtitle1: Odessa Science Officer: Jacob Schleappi Wolf Spider: Stephen Noreck

big_message.title: Cast
big_message.subtitle1: Lt. Stone, Marine: Thor Zednik Sgt. Rockwell, Marine: Paul Rockwell

big_message.title: Special Thanks to Critical Hit Games!
